## SkyRenderer.cloudy property

Light density of the sky.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get cloudy(): number;

set cloudy(val: number);
```

## Remarks

This value controls how much cloud should be rendered when the sky type is scatter. Typically, the value should be in the range of 0 to 1.
